Now Casting!

Have a petty grievance? Is your neighbor's lawn gnome staring at you funny? Apply now to have your dispute settled, permanently. With crayons.

Reality, Redrawn.

The universe is a chaotic yarn ball of petty disputes. We're here to straighten it out. Using legally-binding, future-proofed Crayon Contracts™, we transform your mundane human conflicts into premium, broadcastable content. It's time to face the paw.

Our Content Claws-folio

Neighborhood Watch 3000

Our flagship program. From passive-aggressive parking notes to flagrant fence-line foliage violations, no suburban squabble is too small. Our patented 'Dispute Resolution Feline' (DRF) oversees all negotiations, ensuring a fair and binding outcome documented in your choice of 'Cerulean Rage' or 'Magenta Mischief' crayon.

The Litterbox

A lifestyle intervention show for the hopelessly disorganized. We send in a team of elite Cat-sultants to judge your messy life choices, knock things off shelves, and nap on your important documents. Participants emerge with a new appreciation for minimalism and the structural integrity of their possessions.

Crayon Court

The dramatic legal spin-off you never knew you needed. Watch as top lawyers from the 31st century argue cases based entirely on the ambiguous scribbles of a Crayon Contract™. "Your honor, my client clearly intended this purple smudge to represent a lifetime supply of tuna, not forfeiture of his property!"

Frequently Asked Qats (F.A.Qats)

Is any of this legal?

Our Crayon Contracts™ are drafted by the finest legal minds of the 2970s and are considered 'adorably binding' in at least 17 different timelines. We find that pre-temporal courts are often too confused to argue. It works out.

What if I'm allergic to cats?

A minor administrative hurdle. Participation implies consent to our patented 'Allergen Saturation Therapy' (AST), which has a 5% chance of granting you night vision. We consider that a generous bonus.

Why crayons? Is it a commentary on the infantilization of modern legal discourse?

No. They offer a unique blend of vibrant legal authority and, according to our research and development department, deliciousness. The wax-to-pigment ratio is key for both binding arbitration and a satisfying crunch.

Can I choose my own crayon color?

Of course. We offer a curated palette for our contracts, ranging from 'Existential Dread Black' for severe violations to 'Periwinkle Promise' for more amicable resolutions. A color consultation fee applies.
